roleset.name: cover with soap
roleset.note: LATHER-V NOTES: Frames file for 'lather' based on sentences in brown. (from lather.01-v predicate notes)

example.name: intransitive
example.text: At that moment the bathroom door flew [*-1] open and Eugene came out , with his face lathered for shaving , and strode down the hall , [*]tying the sash of his dressing gown as he went .
